Hi, I'm Sonja Schönburg

Jr. Fullstack Developer and B.Sc. Geographer

Learn more

I'm passionate about maps. And building cool things with code.

As a lateral entry employee (B.Sc. in Applied Geography) I gained some experience in the tech industry during my internship in San Francisco, my work for a start-up and lastly, my fulltime job as a software tester in Aachen. But I wanted to do more than testing. I wanted to CREATE cool, usable software. So I decided to shift my career goals even further and applied at the WBS Coding School in Berlin. After 15 incredible fun, intense and educational weeks I successfully completed the Fullstack Web & App Development Course. I'm excited to finally start my career as a Fullstack Developer with a passion for everything geographical. I'm currently living with my husband and our cat nearby Cologne.
